step_zh: 用火柴在出气口点燃一氧化碳，观察燃烧现象
step_en: Ignite the carbon monoxide at the outlet with a match and observe the combustion phenomenon
clip_video_path: /path/to/chemistry/ch_67/video/02-一氧化碳的燃烧/02-一氧化碳的燃烧_step_3.mp4
subject: chemistry

annotations.text: 用火柴在出气口点燃一氧化碳
annotations.text_en: Ignite the carbon monoxide at the gas outlet with a match
annotations.safety_en: Conduct a gas purity test first to prevent air mixture in the gas that may cause explosive combustion.
annotations.safety_zh: 必须先进行气体验纯操作，防止气体中混入空气引发爆燃

annotations.text: 观察到一氧化碳燃烧发出浅蓝色火焰
annotations.text_en: Observe the pale blue flame produced by carbon monoxide combustion
